message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to buy this product from me. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $850000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to go up to $800000, but no higher. Can you meet me at that price?
